== Bugs Growing in Grid Space ==

# Extend the the AORS example BugsGrowingInGridSpace  towards the full "Stupid Model" described in [http://hydrogen.informatik.tu-cottbus.de/moodle/file.php/38/Review-Agent-based-Simulation-Platforms-Railsback.pdf Railsback, Lytinen and Jackson; 2008]. In particular, implement the following versions:

   1. Version 11: Optimal movement (section 3.3.11)
   2. Version 12: Mortality and reproduction (section 3.3.12)
   3. Version 16: Predators (section 3.3.16)
